Problem 1

Porblem 2

Well i’m trying to get my portals working but it wont work i’ve tried doing this,

case 2469: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if (actionTimer == 0) { teleportToX = (3341); teleportToY = (3246); sendMessage("Welcome to the Shops"); } } break;

And this…

Somone help?
